column.name: ENABLED
column.comment: Flag to denote if this account is enabled

class.name: org.yes.cart.domain.entity.impl.EtypeEntity
class.comment: Types, that will be used in system.

column.name: JAVATYPE
column.comment: Shows the java type

column.name: BUSINESSTYPE
column.comment: Used mostly on UI. How to represent product, category, attributes, etc

column.name: MANDATORY
column.comment: Attribute must have the default value if mandatory flag is true

column.name: SECURE_ATTRIBUTE
column.comment: Attribute contains sensitive data if secure flag is true

column.name: ALLOWDUPLICATE
column.comment: Allow to duplicate attr values. Example color - red and black

column.name: ALLOWFAILOVER
column.comment: Allow search attribute value in parent object

column.name: VAL
column.comment: Default value , shall be force inserted for new attributes, if attribute is mandatory

column.name: REXP
column.comment: Regular expression to validate user input on UI.

column.name: V_FAILED_MSG
column.comment: Message if type, mandatory or re validation failed

column.name: [RANK]
column.comment: What order in dynamic form on UI

column.name: CHOICES
column.comment: Comma separated list of [key-]value. Or service url.

column.name: STORE
column.comment: Will attribute be stored in FT index

column.name: SEARCH
column.comment: Will attribute be used for searching

column.name: SEARCHPRIMARY
column.comment: Will attribute be used for exact searching

column.name: NAV
column.comment: Will be used in filtered navigation

class.name: org.yes.cart.domain.entity.impl.AddressEntity
class.comment: Locations have the same address struct in the same region

column.name: FSPOINTER
column.comment: Absolute path to folder with html template files and images.

column.name: [RANK]
column.comment: What order for filtered navigation

column.name: VISIBLE
column.comment: Is attribute visible on storefront

column.name: SIMILARITY
column.comment: Will attribute be used for checking similarity

column.name: IS_NUMERIC
column.comment: Is this attribute value numeric

column.name: NAV_TEMPLATE
column.comment: Optional navigation template to use

column.name: NAV_TYPE
column.comment: S - single, R- range

column.name: RANGE_NAV
column.comment: In case of range navigation hold the ranges values

column.name: UITEMPLATE
column.comment: What UI template will be used for show particular type of product.

column.name: UISEARCHTEMPLATE
column.comment: UI template label for search on category, if category has a default product type.

column.name: SERVICE
column.comment: shall we treat this like service ? It mean no inventory will be check

column.name: SHIPPABLE
column.comment: is this a physical product ? must have weight and sizes in attributes if yes

column.name: DIGITAL
column.comment: is this the digital product ?

column.name: DOWNLOADABLE
column.comment: is digital product can be downloaded?

class.name: org.yes.cart.domain.entity.impl.ProdTypeAttributeViewGroupEntity
class.comment: Attrib view group. Example: optic system, sizes, etc.

column.name: [RANK]
column.comment: What the default order of attribute group for prod type ?

column.name: [RANK]
column.comment: What the default order of child category in parent ?

column.name: PRODUCTTYPE_ID
column.comment: Default product type in category, can be null if category contains different product types

column.name: UITEMPLATE
column.comment: point to a products in list template. Can be used parent template if it not set. In case of no templates at all, store product in list template will be used

column.name: NAV_BY_ATTR
column.comment: Filtered navigation by attribute values

column.name: NAV_BY_PRICE
column.comment: Filtered navigation by price range

column.name: NAV_BY_PRICE_TIERS
column.comment: Optional price range configuration. Default shop price tiers configuration will used if empty

column.name: [RANK]
column.comment: What the default order of child content in parent ?

column.name: UITEMPLATE
column.comment: point to a products in list template. Can be used parent template if it not set. In case of no templates at all, store product in list template will be used

column.name: [CODE]
column.comment: Product or product sku code

column.name: TAG
column.comment: Set of space separated product tags

column.name: CONFIGURABLE
column.comment: can this product have configuration options ?

column.name: [RANK]
column.comment: RANK defines order of option selection priority (used by UI)

column.name: MANDATORY
column.comment: An option must be selected if mandatory flag is true

column.name: [RANK]
column.comment: Order of sku for product. First is default.

column.name: TAG
column.comment: Set of space separated product tags

class.name: org.yes.cart.domain.entity.impl.SkuPriceEntity
class.comment: Prices. Some discriminators like condition can be added

column.name: QTY
column.comment: Quantity of SKU. Price tier

column.name: REGULAR_PRICE
column.comment: Regular price

column.name: SALE_PRICE
column.comment: Sale price. Must be less that regular

column.name: MINIMAL_PRICE
column.comment: Minimal price used in name-your-price pricing strategy. Must be less that regular

column.name: TAG
column.comment: Set of space separated price tags

column.name: [RANK]
column.comment: What the default order of particular product in particular category

column.name: [RANK]
FSPOINTER
column.comment: Point to jsps

column.name: [RANK]
column.comment: Warehouse priority usage

class.name: org.yes.cart.domain.entity.impl.SkuWarehouseEntity
class.comment: Real quantity of sku at each warehouse

column.name: QUANTITY
column.comment: Current quantity

column.name: RESERVED
column.comment: Reserved by payment transaction quantity.

column.name: FEATURED
column.comment: Is product featured?

column.name: TAG
column.comment: Set of space separated product tags

column.name: [RANK]
column.comment: What the default order of assignmet ?

class.name: org.yes.cart.domain.entity.impl.ShopAdvPlaceRuleEntity
class.comment: Adv rules for show some item in adv place

column.name: TAG
column.comment: Set of space separated customer tags

column.name: WL_TYPE
column.comment: W-single, A-Available reminder, P-Price reminder, R-In promo reminder

column.name: VISIBILITY
column.comment: P-private, S-shared

column.name: TAG
column.comment: Set of space separated promotion tags

column.name: QTY
column.comment: Quantity of SKU.

column.name: REGULAR_PRICE_WHEN_ADDED
column.comment: Regular price when this item was added

column.name: REGULAR_PRICE_CURRENCY_WHEN_ADDED
column.comment: Regular price currency when this item was added

column.name: PG_LABEL
column.comment: Payment gateway label

column.name: ORDERNUM
column.comment: Depends from order num producer.

column.name: MESSAGE
column.comment: Free text information per each order. Can be whatever

column.name: B2B_REMARKS
column.comment: Free text information per each order. Can be whatever

column.name: BILLING_ADDRESS
column.comment: Address composed for billing

column.name: SHIPPING_ADDRESS
column.comment: Shipping address

column.name: MULTIPLE_SHIPMENT
column.comment: Wait for all skus in case of not all available.

column.name: DELIVERYNUM
column.comment: Order contract in case of splited orders (XXX-1,XXX-2, etc). Delivery contract XXX-2-DDD1,XXX-2-DDD2, XXX-2-DDD3, where XXX order num, DDD delivery num.

column.name: REF_NO
column.comment: External ref number

column.name: QTY
column.comment: Quantity of SKU in this praticular delivery

class.name: org.yes.cart.domain.entity.impl.CarrierSlaEntity
class.comment: Shipment service layer agreement. Days, distances , etc.

column.name: TAG
column.comment: Set of space separated promotion tags

hibernate-mapping.query: select o.shop from ShopUrlEntity o fetch all properties where o.url = ?1
select o from ShopEntity o fetch all properties where o.code = ?1
select o from ShopEntity o fetch all properties where (o.name = ?1 or o.code = ?1) and o.master.shopId = ?2
select o from ShopEntity o fetch all properties where o.master is null
select o from ShopEntity o fetch all properties where o.master.shopId = ?1
select co.shop from CustomerOrderEntity co where co.cartGuid = ?1
select co.shop from CustomerOrderEntity co where co.ordernum = ?1
select scs from ShoppingCartStateEntity scs where scs.guid = ?1
select scs from ShoppingCartStateEntity scs where scs.customerLogin = ?1 and scs.shopId = ?2 and scs.ordernum IS NULL
select scs from ShoppingCartStateEntity scs where scs.ordernum = ?1
select sc from ShopCategoryEntity sc where sc.shop.shopId = ?1
select l.categoryId from CategoryEntity l where l.linkToId = ?1

select new org.yes.cart.domain.dto.impl.CategoryRelationDTOImpl( l.guid, l.categoryId, l.parentId, l.linkToId, l.rank, l.name, l.displayNameInternal, l.disabled, l.availablefrom, l.availableto ) from CategoryEntity l where l.categoryId = ?1
select l.categoryId, l.parentId, l.linkToId from CategoryEntity l
select c from CategoryEntity c WHERE c.categoryId = c.parentId
select c from CategoryEntity c, ProductCategoryEntity pc where c.categoryId = pc.category.categoryId and pc.product.productId =?1 order by c.rank
select c from CategoryEntity c where c.parentId = ?1 and c.categoryId <> c.parentId

select new org.yes.cart.domain.dto.impl.CategoryRelationDTOImpl( c.guid, c.categoryId, c.parentId, c.linkToId, c.rank, c.name, c.displayNameInternal, c.disabled, c.availablefrom, c.availableto ) from CategoryEntity c where c.parentId = ?1 and c.categoryId <> c.parentId
select c from CategoryEntity c where (?1 is null or lower(c.guid) like ?1) OR (?2 is null or lower(c.name) like ?2) OR (?3 is null or lower(c.seoInternal.uri) like ?3)
select c from CategoryEntity c where (lower(c.seoInternal.uri) like ?1)
select c from ContentEntity c, ShopEntity s WHERE c.guid = s.code AND c.parentId = 0 AND s.shopId = ?1
select l.contentId, l.parentId from ContentEntity l
select s.code from ShopEntity s WHERE s.shopId = ?1
select s.shopId from ShopEntity s where s.code = ?1
select a.shop.shopId from ShopAliasEntity a where a.alias = ?1

select av.val from ContentEntity c, AttrValueEntityContent av where c.contentId = av.content.contentId and c.contentId = ?1 and av.attributeCode like ?2 and (c.disabled = ?4) and (c.availablefrom < ?3 OR c.availablefrom IS NULL) and (c.availableto > ?3 OR c.availableto IS NULL) order by av.attributeCode
select a from AttributeEntity a where a.code like ?1 order by a.code asc
select c from ContentEntity c where c.parentId = ?1 and c.contentId <> c.parentId
select c from ContentEntity c where (?1 is null or lower(c.guid) like ?1) OR (?2 is null or lower(c.name) like ?2) OR (?3 is null or lower(c.seoInternal.uri) like ?3)
select c from ContentEntity c where (lower(c.seoInternal.uri) like ?1)
select c.contentId from ContentEntity c where c.seoInternal.uri = ?1
select c.seoInternal.uri, c.contentId from ContentEntity c where c.contentId = ?1
select c.contentId from ContentEntity c where c.guid = ?1
select c from ContentEntity c where c.seoInternal.uri = ?1
select c from ContentEntity c where c.guid = ?1
select p.productId from ProductEntity p
select p from ProductEntity p left join fetch p.productCategory where p.productId = ?1
select s.skuId from ProductSkuEntity s
select s from ProductSkuEntity s inner join fetch s.product where s.skuId = ?1
select pc from ProductCategoryEntity pc where pc.category.categoryId = ?1 and pc.product.productId =?2
select pc from ProductCategoryEntity pc where pc.product.productId =?1
select pc.category.categoryId from ProductCategoryEntity pc where pc.product.productId =?1
delete from ProductCategoryEntity pc where pc.product.productId = ?1
delete from ProductCategoryEntity pc where pc.category.categoryId = ?1 and pc.product.productId = ?2
select count(p) from CustomerOrderEntity p
select distinct d.customerOrder.customerorderId from CustomerOrderDeliveryEntity d where d.customerOrderDeliveryId in ?1
select o.customerorderId from CustomerOrderEntity o where o.eligibleForExport is not null and o.blockExport = ?1
select o.customerorderId from CustomerOrderEntity o where o.orderStatus in ?1
select distinct sw.skuCode from SkuWarehouseEntity sw where sw.updatedTimestamp >= ?1 or ?1 is null

select distinct d from CustomerOrderDeliveryEntity d inner join d.detail dd where d.deliveryStatus = ?1 and d.customerOrder.orderStatus in ?2 and dd.productSkuCode in ?3 order by d.customerOrderDeliveryId
select distinct d from CustomerOrderDeliveryEntity d inner join d.detail dd where d.deliveryStatus = ?1 and d.customerOrder.orderStatus in ?2 order by d.customerOrderDeliveryId

select distinct d.customerOrderDeliveryId from CustomerOrderDeliveryEntity d inner join d.detail dd where d.deliveryStatus = ?1 and d.customerOrder.orderStatus in ?2 and dd.productSkuCode in ?3 order by d.customerOrderDeliveryId

select distinct d.customerOrderDeliveryId from CustomerOrderDeliveryEntity d inner join d.detail dd where d.deliveryStatus = ?1 and d.customerOrder.orderStatus in ?2 order by d.customerOrderDeliveryId

select distinct d.customerOrderDeliveryId from CustomerOrderDeliveryEntity d inner join d.detail dd where d.deliveryStatus = ?1 and d.customerOrder.orderStatus in ?2 and d.customerOrder.shop.shopId in ?3 order by d.customerOrderDeliveryId
select a.displayValInternal from AttrValueEntityProduct a where a.attributeCode = ?1 and a.val = ?2
select a.displayValInternal from AttrValueEntityProductSku a where a.attributeCode = ?1 and a.val = ?2
select ptg from ProdTypeAttributeViewGroupEntity ptg where ptg.producttype.producttypeId = ?1
select pta from ProductTypeAttrEntity pta where pta.producttype.producttypeId = ?1
select pta from ProductTypeAttrEntity pta, AttributeEntity attr where pta.attributeCode = attr.code and pta.producttype.producttypeId = ?1 and pta.visible = ?2 and attr.navigation = ?3
select attr from ProductTypeAttrEntity pta, AttributeEntity attr where pta.attributeCode = attr.code and pta.producttype.producttypeId = ?1
select pta.producttype from ProductTypeAttrEntity pta where pta.attributeCode = ?1
select distinct c.productType from CategoryEntity c
select attr from AttributeEntity attr where attr.attributeGroup = ?1 and attr.etype = 'Image' order by attr.code
select attr from AttributeEntity attr where attr.attributeGroup = ?1 and attr.code like ?2 order by attr.code
select pav.val from AttrValueEntityProduct pav where pav.product.productId = ?1 and pav.attributeCode = ?2
select pav.product.productId, pav.val from AttrValueEntityProduct pav where pav.attributeCode = ?1

select pta from ProductTypeAttrEntity pta, AttributeEntity attr where pta.attributeCode = attr.code and pta.producttype.producttypeId = ?1 and pta.navigationType = 'R' and attr.navigation = ?2 and pta.visible = ?3
select p from ProductEntity p where p.productId in (?1)
select distinct a.code from AttributeEntity a
select distinct a.code from AttributeEntity a where a.navigation = ?1
select distinct a.code from AttributeEntity a where a.search = ?1 and a.navigation = ?2
select distinct a.code from AttributeEntity a where a.store = ?1
select distinct a.code from AttributeEntity a where a.search = ?1 and a.primary = ?2

select distinct pt.attributeCode, pt.rank from ProductTypeAttrEntity pt, AttributeEntity attr where pt.attributeCode = attr.code and pt.producttype.producttypeId = ?1 and attr.navigation = ?2 and pt.navigationType = 'S' and pt.visible = ?3
select a from AttributeEntity a where a.code = ?1
select a from AttributeEntity a where a.attributeGroup = ?1 order by a.code
select a from AttributeEntity a where a.allowduplicate = ?2 and a.attributeGroup = ?1
select a from AttributeEntity a where a.attributeGroup = ?1 and a.code not in (?2)
select a from AttributeEntity a where a.attributeGroup = ?1 and a.code in (?2)
select distinct a.code, a.name, a.displayNameInternal from AttributeEntity a where a.code in (?1)
select distinct a.code, a.name, a.displayNameInternal from AttributeEntity a
select a from ProductAssociationEntity a where a.product.productId = ?1 order by a.rank
select a from ProductAssociationEntity a where a.product.productId = ?1 and a.association.code = ?2 order by a.rank
select a.associatedSku from ProductAssociationEntity a where a.product.productId = ?1 and a.association.code = ?2 order by a.rank
select a from ProductEntity a where a.code = ?1

select a from ProductEntity a fetch all properties where (?1 is null or lower(a.code) like ?1 or lower(a.manufacturerCode) like ?1 or lower(a.supplierCode) like ?1 or lower(a.pimCode) like ?1 or lower(a.guid) like ?1 or a.productId = ?2) and (?3 is null or lower(a.name) like ?3) and (?4 is null or a.brand.brandId = ?4) and (?5 is null or a.producttype.producttypeId = ?5)
select distinct a.supplierCatalogCode from ProductEntity a where a.supplierCatalogCode is not null
select a from ProductSkuEntity a where a.code = ?1
select a.product from ProductSkuEntity a where a.code = ?1
select c from CategoryEntity c where c.guid = ?1
select c.categoryId from CategoryEntity c where c.guid = ?1
select c.categoryId from CategoryEntity c where c.guid in ?1
select c from CategoryEntity c where c.seoInternal.uri = ?1
select c.categoryId from CategoryEntity c where c.seoInternal.uri = ?1
select c.seoInternal.uri, c.categoryId from CategoryEntity c where c.categoryId = ?1
select count(c.categoryId) from CategoryEntity c where c.parentId in (?1)
select c.categoryId from CategoryEntity c where lower(c.guid) like ?1 or lower(c.name) like ?1
select p from ProductEntity p where p.seoInternal.uri = ?1
select p.productId from ProductEntity p where p.seoInternal.uri = ?1
select p.productId from ProductEntity p where p.guid = ?1
select p.productId from ProductEntity p where p.code = ?1
select p.productId from ProductEntity p where p.manufacturerCode = ?1
select p.productId from ProductEntity p where p.pimCode = ?1
select s.product.productId from ProductSkuEntity s where s.barCode = ?1
select s.product.productId from ProductSkuEntity s where s.barCode in (?1)
select avp.product.productId from AttrValueEntityProduct avp where avp.attributeCode = ?1 and avp.val = ?2
select p.seoInternal.uri, p.productId from ProductEntity p where p.productId = ?1
select ps from ProductSkuEntity ps where ps.seoInternal.uri = ?1
select ps.skuId from ProductSkuEntity ps where ps.seoInternal.uri = ?1
select ps.skuId from ProductSkuEntity ps where ps.guid = ?1
select ps.skuId from ProductSkuEntity ps where ps.code = ?1
select ps.seoInternal.uri, ps.skuId from ProductSkuEntity ps where ps.skuId = ?1
select p.name from ProductEntity p where p.code = ?1
select ps.name from ProductSkuEntity ps where ps.code = ?1
select ps.name from CarrierSlaEntity ps where ps.guid = ?1
select b from BrandEntity b where b.name =?1
select b from BrandEntity b where b.guid =?1
select b from BrandEntity b where (?1 is null or lower(b.guid) like ?1) or (?2 is null or lower(b.name) like ?2) or (?3 is null or lower(b.description) like ?3) order by b.name
select new org.yes.cart.domain.misc.Pair(r, mr) from RoleEntity r, ManagerRoleEntity mr where r.code = mr.code and mr.login = ?1 order by r.code
select r from RoleEntity r where r.code not in ( select mr.code from ManagerRoleEntity mr where mr.login = ?1 ) order by r.code
select max(pc.rank) from ProductCategoryEntity pc where pc.category.categoryId = ?1
select w from WarehouseEntity w, ShopWarehouseEntity sw where w.warehouseId = sw.warehouse.warehouseId and sw.shop.id = ?1 order by sw.rank
select w from WarehouseEntity w, ShopWarehouseEntity sw where w.warehouseId = sw.warehouse.warehouseId and sw.shop.id = ?1 and sw.disabled = ?2 order by sw.rank
update ShopWarehouseEntity w set w.rank = ?2 where w.shopWarehouseId = ?1
select sc from ShopCategoryEntity sc where sc.category.categoryId = ?1 and sc.shop.id = ?2
select sw from SkuWarehouseEntity sw where sw.skuCode in (?1) and sw.warehouse.warehouseId = ?2 order by sw.warehouse.warehouseId
select sw from SkuWarehouseEntity sw where sw.skuCode = ?1
select sw from SkuWarehouseEntity sw where sw.skuCode = ?1 and sw.warehouse.warehouseId = ?2 order by sw.warehouse.warehouseId
select sw from SkuWarehouseEntity sw where sw.skuCode = ?1 and sw.warehouse.warehouseId in (?2)
select a.shop.code from AttrValueEntityShop a where a.attributeCode like ?2 and a.indexedVal = ?1
select a.val from AttrValueEntityShop a where a.shop.shopId = ?1 and a.attributeCode = ?2
select a.brand.name, a.brand.guid from AttrValueEntityBrand a where a.attributeCode like ?2 and a.indexedVal = ?1
select a.category.seoInternal.uri, a.category.guid from AttrValueEntityCategory a where a.attributeCode like ?2 and a.indexedVal = ?1
select a.content.seoInternal.uri, a.content.guid from AttrValueEntityContent a where a.attributeCode like ?2 and a.indexedVal = ?1
select a.product.code from AttrValueEntityProduct a where a.attributeCode like ?2 and a.indexedVal = ?1
select a.productSku.code from AttrValueEntityProductSku a where a.attributeCode like ?2 and a.indexedVal = ?1

select distinct(a.customer.customerId) from AddressEntity a where a.customer.customerId is not null and (lower(a.addrline1) like ?1 or lower(a.addrline2) like ?1 or lower(a.city) like ?1 or lower(a.countryCode) like ?1 or lower(a.stateCode) like ?1 or lower(a.postcode) like ?1 or lower(a.companyName1) like ?1 or lower(a.companyName2) like ?1)
select a from AddressEntity a where a.customer.customerId = ?1
select a from AddressEntity a where a.customer.customerId = ?1 and a.addressType = ?2
update AddressEntity a set a.defaultAddress = ?3 where a.customer.customerId = ?1 and a.addressType = ?2
select new org.yes.cart.domain.misc.Pair(cse.customer, cse.shop) from CustomerShopEntity cse where lower(cse.customer.login) = ?1 and cse.disabled = ?2
select cse.customer from CustomerShopEntity cse where lower(cse.customer.login) = ?1 and (cse.shop.shopId = ?2 or cse.shop.master.shopId = ?2) and cse.disabled = ?3
select cse.customer from CustomerShopEntity cse where lower(cse.customer.login) = ?1 and (cse.shop.shopId = ?2 or cse.shop.master.shopId = ?2)
select count(customerShopId) from CustomerShopEntity cse where lower(cse.customer.login) = ?1 and (cse.shop.shopId = ?2 or cse.shop.master.shopId = ?2)
select count(customerShopId) from CustomerShopEntity cse where lower(cse.customer.login) = ?1 and (cse.shop.shopId = ?2 or cse.shop.master.shopId = ?2) and cse.disabled = ?3

select count(customerShopId) from CustomerShopEntity cse where lower(cse.customer.login) = ?1 and (cse.shop.shopId = ?2 or cse.shop.master.shopId = ?2) and cse.customer.password = ?3 and cse.disabled = ?4
select count(managerShopId) from ManagerShopEntity mse where lower(mse.manager.login) = ?1 and (mse.shop.shopId = ?2 or mse.shop.master.shopId = ?2) and mse.manager.enabled = ?3
select count(managerRoleId) from ManagerRoleEntity mre where lower(mre.login) = ?1 and mre.code in (?2)
select mre.code from ManagerRoleEntity mre where lower(mre.login) = ?1
select count(managerShopId) from ManagerShopEntity mse where lower(mse.manager.login) = ?1 and (mse.shop.shopId = ?2 or mse.shop.master.shopId = ?2) and mse.manager.password = ?3
select w from CustomerWishListEntity w where w.customer.customerId = ?1
select a from CarrierSlaEntity a where a.carrier.carrierId = ?1
select distinct a.carrier from CarrierShopEntity a where a.shop.shopId = ?1
select distinct a.carrier from CarrierShopEntity a where a.shop.shopId = ?1 and a.disabled = ?2
delete from ShopTopSellerEntity st where st.shop = ?1
select sp from SkuPriceEntity sp where sp.skuCode = ?1 and sp.currency = ?2 and sp.shop.shopId = ?3
select sp from SkuPriceEntity sp where sp.skuCode = ?1 and sp.currency = ?2 and (sp.shop.shopId = ?3 or sp.shop.shopId = ?4)
select sp from SkuPriceEntity sp where sp.skuCode = ?1 and sp.currency = ?2
select sp from SkuPriceEntity sp where sp.skuCode in (select s.code from ProductSkuEntity s where s.product.productId = ?1) and sp.currency = ?2 and sp.shop.shopId = ?3
select sp from SkuPriceEntity sp where sp.skuCode in (select s.code from ProductSkuEntity s where s.product.productId = ?1) and sp.currency = ?2 and (sp.shop.shopId = ?3 or sp.shop.shopId = ?4)
select sp from SkuPriceEntity sp where sp.skuCode in (select s.code from ProductSkuEntity s where s.product.productId = ?1) and sp.currency = ?2
select sp from SkuPriceEntity sp where sp.skuCode in (select s.code from ProductSkuEntity s where s.product.productId = ?1)
select sp from SkuPriceEntity sp where sp.skuCode = ?1 and (sp.pricingPolicy is NULL or sp.pricingPolicy = '')
delete from SkuPriceEntity sp where sp.skuCode = ?1
delete from CustomerWishListEntity wl where wl.skuCode = ?1
delete from ProductOptionEntity eo where eo.product.productId = ?1
delete from ProductOptionEntity eo where eo.product.productId = ?1 and eo.skuCode = ?2
select sw, sw.skuCode from SkuWarehouseEntity sw where sw.skuCode in (select s.code from ProductSkuEntity s where s.product.productId = ?1)
delete from SkuWarehouseEntity sw where sw.skuCode = ?1
select w.skuCode from SkuWarehouseEntity w where w.disabled = ?2 or (w.availableto is not null and w.availableto < ?1)
select cod.productSkuCode, sum(cod.qty) from CustomerOrderDetEntity cod where cod.customerOrder.shop = ?1 and cod.customerOrder.orderTimestamp >= ?2 group by cod.productSkuCode
select p from PromotionEntity p where p.shopCode = ?1 and p.currency = ?2 order by p.enabledFrom asc, p.enabledTo asc, p.rank asc, p.promotionId asc

select p from PromotionEntity p where p.shopCode = ?1 and p.currency = ?2 and p.enabled = ?3 and (p.enabledFrom < ?4 OR p.enabledFrom IS NULL) and (p.enabledTo > ?5 OR p.enabledTo IS NULL) order by p.enabledFrom asc, p.enabledTo asc, p.rank asc, p.promotionId asc
select c from PromotionCouponEntity c where c.code = ?1

select c from PromotionCouponEntity c where c.code = ?1 and c.promotion.enabled = ?2 and c.usageLimit > c.usageCount and (c.promotion.enabledFrom < ?3 OR c.promotion.enabledFrom IS NULL) and (c.promotion.enabledTo > ?4 OR c.promotion.enabledTo IS NULL)
select count(c.id) from PromotionCouponUsageEntity c where c.couponCode = ?1 and c.customerRef = ?2 and c.customerOrder.orderStatus not in (?3)
select count(c.promotioncouponusageId) from PromotionCouponUsageEntity c where c.couponCode = ?1
delete from PromotionCouponEntity c where c.promotion.promotionId = ?1
select new org.yes.cart.domain.misc.Pair(c.promotion.promotionId, c.promotion.code) from PromotionCouponEntity c where c.code = ?1
select p.promotionId from PromotionEntity p where p.code = ?1
select t from TaxEntity t where t.shopCode = ?1 and t.currency = ?2
select t from TaxEntity t where t.shopCode in ?1 and t.currency = ?2

select tc from TaxConfigEntity tc where tc.tax in (?1) and (tc.countryCode = ?2 or tc.countryCode is null or tc.countryCode = '') and (tc.stateCode = ?3 or tc.stateCode is null or tc.stateCode = '') and (tc.productCode = ?4 or tc.productCode is null or tc.productCode = '')
select m from MailEntity m order by m.createdTimestamp asc
select m from MailEntity m where m.mailId > ?1 order by m.createdTimestamp asc
select dg from DataGroupEntity dg where dg.type = ?1
select dg from DataGroupEntity dg where dg.name = ?1
select dd from DataDescriptorEntity dd where dd.name = ?1
select dd from DataDescriptorEntity dd where dd.name in (?1)
